  <!-- Wrappers for expressions and commands generated by a parser. -->
  <xs:element name="ParserExpression">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element ref="Sequence"/>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute name="expressionName" type="xs:string"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
  <xs:element name="ParserCommand">
    <xs:complexType>
      <xs:sequence>
        <xs:element ref="Sequence"/>
      </xs:sequence>
      <xs:attribute name="commandName" type="xs:string"/>
    </xs:complexType>
  </xs:element>
  
  
  

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<P2:ParserExpression xmlns:P2="http://foo.org/Phase2_v0.xsd"
xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
expressionName="Token4">

  <P2:Sequence sequenceType="delayed">
    <P2:Sequence sequenceType="delayed">
      <xs:string>Token1</xs:string>
      <xs:string>Token2</xs:string>
    </P2:Sequence>
    <xs:string>Token3</xs:string>
  </P2:Sequence>
  
</P2:ParserExpression>




<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<P2:ParserCommand xmlns:P2="http://foo.org/Phase2_v0.xsd"
xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
commandName="exit">

  <P2:Sequence sequenceType="delayed">
  </P2:Sequence>
  
</P2:ParserCommand>
